posts.post_content:
@sarroth:  
Yes, because comparing a Rare to a Mythic makes so much sense.  
  
I can see Captivating Vampire becoming a key component to many Vampire decks. You can steal creatures, and at the same time you're getting more Vampires to: let you steal MORE creatures, fuel spells like Blood Tribute, enhance the effects of Malakir Bloodwitch, More creatures to benefit from Vampire Nocturnus...   
  
Heck, I'd be surprised to find a Vampire player who doesn't want *four* of these guys.
